name: Flea Madness
storyline: Multiplayer game which shows you that there is no place without madness in the Flea universe. This story begins when the spacecraft crashes on an unknown planet. Two species of alien fleas destroy all life and then start fighting for the title of the most creepy creature in a world. Grown as a biological weapon, these insects live for the sole purpose - eating everything what moves. Choose which race you belong to and destroy other one with your team
summary: Hunt. Eat. Evolve! Join a team of alien fleas in this fast-paced game of maddening multiplayer melee mayhem! Choose your species, customize your abilities, and then hunt, eat, and squash your friends and frenemies in team play—or Flea for All, where there can Flea only one!
